Package hw2

Class Room

java.lang.Object
hw2.Room
public class Room extends Object
Represents a room within a hotel, characterized by its type, price, and availability. The room type can be one of "Double", "Queen", or "King", each with a predefined price. Availability indicates whether the room is currently available for reservation.
Since:
13/03/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Panagiotis Tsembekis

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(String roomType)
      Constructs a Room with the specified type. Initializes the room as available and sets its price based on the type.
      Parameters:
      roomType - The type of the room, which can be "Double", "Queen", or "King".
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the roomType is not one of the specified types.

    • Room

      public Room(Room r)
      Copy constructor. Creates a new Room object with the same attributes as the provided room.
      Parameters:
      r - The Room object to be copied.

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Returns the type of the room.
      Returns:
      The room type.

    • getPrice

      public int getPrice()
      Returns the price of the room in cents.
      Returns:
      The room price.

    • changeAvailability

      public void changeAvailability()
      Toggles the availability status of the room.

    • findAvailableRoom

      public static Room findAvailableRoom(Room[] rooms, String roomType)
      Searches for the first available room of the specified type in the provided array of rooms and marks it as unavailable.
      Parameters:
      rooms - An array of Room objects.
      roomType - The type of room to find.
      Returns:
      The first available Room of the specified type, or null if no available room is found.

    • makeRoomAvailable

      public static boolean makeRoomAvailable(Room[] rooms, String type)
      Makes the first unavailable room of the specified type in the provided array available again.
      Parameters:
      rooms - An array of Room objects.
      type - The type of room to make available.
      Returns:
      true if a room was made available, false otherwise.
